content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":5821,"originalJapaneseLine":"「た、大変……大変です！　――――シグマ様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-Atrocious... it's terrible! ——Sir Sigma!\""},{"lineNumber":5822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵襲かい！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"An enemy attack!?\""},{"lineNumber":5823,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、魔人です！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it's a demon!\""},{"lineNumber":5824,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人――――レイです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"A demon——Rei!\""},{"lineNumber":5825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、ッらああああァァァッッ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-Arrghhh-aaahhhh!!\""},{"lineNumber":5826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはあああぁぁっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaaaahh!\""},{"lineNumber":5827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬぐ、く……ッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, grr...!\""},{"lineNumber":5828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「チッ、ゴミどもが……わざわざ来たってのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, these trash... coming all this way,\""},{"lineNumber":5829,"originalJapaneseLine":"　退屈させるんじゃねェよ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't bore me...!\""},{"lineNumber":5830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「雷……雷の…………魔人……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lightning... the lightning... demon...\""},{"lineNumber":5831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「鉄兵、器兵が近寄れません！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The iron soldiers and device soldiers can't get close!\""},{"lineNumber":5832,"originalJapaneseLine":"　闘将たちでさえ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even the warlords...\""},{"lineNumber":5833,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドラゴンたちも飛行モンスターの相手で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even the dragons are struggling against the flying monsters,\""},{"lineNumber":5834,"originalJapaneseLine":"　苦慮しております！　このままでは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's tough for them! At this rate...\""},{"lineNumber":5835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ、おいらが出る！　避難を進めてくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, I'll go out! Proceed with the evacuation!\""},{"lineNumber":5836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シグマ様！？　闘神でも、雷は……シグマ様ーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sir Sigma!? Even the war gods, the lightning is... Sir Sigma—!\""},{"lineNumber":5837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……フン。どうも、脆い都市を引いちまったか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph. Seems I've been assigned a fragile city.\""},{"lineNumber":5838,"originalJapaneseLine":"　くっだらねェ。さっさと落として……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How boring. I'll drop it quickly...\""},{"lineNumber":5839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待て！　おいらが相手だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait! I'll take you on!\""},{"lineNumber":5840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「闘神…………ふん。ちったぁヤれんのかよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"War god... Hmph. So you can put up a little fight, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":5841,"originalJapaneseLine":"「器兵や鉄兵がこんなに……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Device soldiers and iron soldiers are this...\""},{"lineNumber":5842,"originalJapaneseLine":"　雷を自在に操る魔人……そんなのがいたなんて","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A demon who controls lightning at will... I never thought such a thing existed.\""},{"lineNumber":5843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けど、ここで引いたら、この身体が無駄になる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But if I retreat here, this body will be wasted.\""},{"lineNumber":5844,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おいら達が三代にわたって作った、この身体が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This body that we have made over three generations.\""},{"lineNumber":5845,"originalJapaneseLine":"「爺ちゃんや父ちゃんの熱意が無駄になる……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Grandpa and dad's passion will be wasted...\""},{"lineNumber":5846,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そいつが、おいらには何より怖い！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is what scares me most!\""},{"lineNumber":5847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ、そうかよ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh, is that so...\""},{"lineNumber":5848,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――すり潰すぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"——— I'll crush you!\""},{"lineNumber":5849,"originalJapaneseLine":"………………・","translatedEnglishLine":"..................."},{"lineNumber":5850,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":5851,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":5852,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ、ひぃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa, hii...\""},{"lineNumber":5853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、おおおぉっ！　シグマ様！　ご無事で！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh! Sir Sigma! You're safe!\""},{"lineNumber":5854,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ご、ご無事じゃないよ……はああぁぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-not safe... haaah...\""},{"lineNumber":5855,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、帯電してるから触らないで」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I'm charged with electricity, so don't touch me.\""},{"lineNumber":5856,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……して、魔人は！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh... and the demon?\""},{"lineNumber":5857,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうにか突き落とした。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I somehow pushed it down.\""},{"lineNumber":5858,"originalJapaneseLine":"　向こうが飛べないのが幸いしたよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Luckily, it can't fly over there.\""},{"lineNumber":5859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、魔人は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, the demon...\""},{"lineNumber":5860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、そうだね。噂の無敵結界。マジだよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that's right. The rumored invincible barrier. It's real.\""},{"lineNumber":5861,"originalJapaneseLine":"　落下したところで、死んでないだろうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even after falling, it probably isn't dead.\""},{"lineNumber":5862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「また…………来るでしょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Will it... come again, I wonder?\""},{"lineNumber":5863,"originalJapaneseLine":"「来るだろうね。笑ってた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It probably will. It was smiling.\""},{"lineNumber":5864,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ……忙しくなるぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then... things are going to get busy!\""},{"lineNumber":5865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ？　そうですね、援軍の手配とか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Yes, arranging reinforcements and such...\""},{"lineNumber":5866,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、ううん。違うよ。改造さ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no. That's not it. Modification.\""},{"lineNumber":5867,"originalJapaneseLine":"「改造…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Modification...\""},{"lineNumber":5868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう。今からあの電撃に耐えられるだけの、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. From now on, I'll develop armor that can withstand that lightning,\""},{"lineNumber":5869,"originalJapaneseLine":"　耐電装甲を開発しなきゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lightning-resistant armor!\""},{"lineNumber":5870,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、今からですか！？　シグマ様が！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-Now!? You, Sir Sigma!?\""},{"lineNumber":5871,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうさ。このボディ、わざわざ指先を尖らせたのは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right. I shaped the fingertips of this body to be pointed,"},{"lineNumber":5872,"originalJapaneseLine":"　精密作業できるように、だよ。開発だってするさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"so I could do precise work. I'll develop it myself.\""},{"lineNumber":5873,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ！　いくぞ、魔人レイ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now! Let's go, demon Rei!\""},{"lineNumber":5874,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここからがおいらの戦いだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From here on out, this is my fight!\""},{"lineNumber":5875,"originalJapaneseLine":"それから、数日後。","translatedEnglishLine":"Several days later."},{"lineNumber":5876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「損傷、80ぱーせんと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damage at 80 percent...\""},{"lineNumber":5877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　残弾、一斉射……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Remaining ammo, fire all at once...!\""},{"lineNumber":5878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!\""},{"lineNumber":5879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「雑魚が強くなってる……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The small fry are getting stronger...?\""},{"lineNumber":5880,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、こいつは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, this one is...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、ッらああああァァァッッ！！」
「チッ、ゴミどもが……わざわざ来たってのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, these trash... coming all this way,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 退屈させるんじゃねェよ……！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The iron soldiers and device soldiers can't get close!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ドラゴンたちも飛行モンスターの相手で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even the dragons are struggling against the flying monsters,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦慮しております！　このままでは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's tough for them! At this rate..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、おいらが出る！　避難を進めてくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I'll go out! Proceed with the evacuation!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シグマ様！？　闘神でも、雷は……シグマ様ーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sir Sigma!? Even the war gods, the lightning is... Sir Sigma—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……フン。どうも、脆い都市を引いちまったか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmph. Seems I've been assigned a fragile city."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっだらねェ。さっさと落として……
「闘神…………ふん。ちったぁヤれんのかよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "War god... Hmph. So you can put up a little fight, huh."
"Device soldiers and iron soldiers are this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷を自在に操る魔人……そんなのがいたなんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A demon who controls lightning at will... I never thought such a thing existed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けど、ここで引いたら、この身体が無駄になる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But if I retreat here, this body will be wasted."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいら達が三代にわたって作った、この身体が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This body that we have made over three generations."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「爺ちゃんや父ちゃんの熱意が無駄になる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Grandpa and dad's passion will be wasted..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつが、おいらには何より怖い！」
「おっ、おおおぉっ！　シグマ様！　ご無事で！」
「ご、ご無事じゃないよ……はああぁぁ……
あ、帯電してるから触らないで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I'm charged with electricity, so don't touch me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうが飛べないのが幸いしたよ」
「うん、そうだね。噂の無敵結界。マジだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that's right. The rumored invincible barrier. It's real."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落下したところで、死んでないだろうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even after falling, it probably isn't dead."
"Well then... things are going to get busy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ？　そうですね、援軍の手配とか……」
「そう。今からあの電撃に耐えられるだけの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. From now on, I'll develop armor that can withstand that lightning,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耐電装甲を開発しなきゃ！」
「い、今からですか！？　シグマ様が！？」
「そうさ。このボディ、わざわざ指先を尖らせたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right. I shaped the fingertips of this body to be pointed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 精密作業できるように、だよ。開発だってするさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "so I could do precise work. I'll develop it myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここからがおいらの戦いだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From here on out, this is my fight!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……フン。どうも、脆い都市を引いちまったか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmph. Seems I've been assigned a fragile city."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっだらねェ。さっさと落として……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "War god... Hmph. So you can put up a little fight, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷を自在に操る魔人……そんなのがいたなんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A demon who controls lightning at will... I never thought such a thing existed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けど、ここで引いたら、この身体が無駄になる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But if I retreat here, this body will be wasted."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいら達が三代にわたって作った、この身体が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This body that we have made over three generations."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「爺ちゃんや父ちゃんの熱意が無駄になる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Grandpa and dad's passion will be wasted..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつが、おいらには何より怖い！」
「おっ、おおおぉっ！　シグマ様！　ご無事で！」
「ご、ご無事じゃないよ……はああぁぁ……
あ、帯電してるから触らないで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I'm charged with electricity, so don't touch me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうが飛べないのが幸いしたよ」
「うん、そうだね。噂の無敵結界。マジだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that's right. The rumored invincible barrier. It's real."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落下したところで、死んでないだろうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even after falling, it probably isn't dead."
"Well then... things are going to get busy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ？　そうですね、援軍の手配とか……」
「そう。今からあの電撃に耐えられるだけの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. From now on, I'll develop armor that can withstand that lightning,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耐電装甲を開発しなきゃ！」
「い、今からですか！？　シグマ様が！？」
「そうさ。このボディ、わざわざ指先を尖らせたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right. I shaped the fingertips of this body to be pointed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 精密作業できるように、だよ。開発だってするさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "so I could do precise work. I'll develop it myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここからがおいらの戦いだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From here on out, this is my fight!"
